p:
We evaluate the performance of these approximations by comparing logistic regression models that predict whether a cluster will establish from either the true R
c /〈 R〉 at the 10% surveillance threshold, the relative fold change between the 6% and 10%, or time elapsed between reaching the 6% and 10% thresholds. As before, we evaluated model performance based on AUC, positive predictive value, and sensitivity.
